data.eml:eml: Redescription of Chribellphoruraallanae (Christiansen & Bellinger, 1980) (Collembola, Onychiuridae), with comments on the systematic position of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pasnik, Grzegorz, Weiner, Wanda Maria (2018): Redescription of Chribellphoruraallanae (Christiansen & Bellinger, 1980) (Collembola, Onychiuridae), with comments on the systematic position of the genus. ZooKeys 803: 1-6, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.803.28265, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.803.28265
